poemsDataJson.list_full: 思(おも)ひわび さても命(いのち)は あるものを 憂(う)きに堪(た)へぬは 涙(なみだ)なりけり
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Though in deep distress//Through your cruel blow, my life//Still is left to me.//But I cannot keep my tears;//They break forth from my grief.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Omoi wabi|Satemo inochi wa|Aru monoo|Uki ni taenu wa|Namida nari keri
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: うきにたへぬは なみたなりけり
poemsDataJson.author: 道因法師(どういんほうし)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: つれない人を恋慕うことのつらさ、悲しさ
